timeline.message: test: Add changes for a go mod why execution.
test: Add output for the go mod why command.
test: Add go mod why to the test app files.
test: Fix the Go Battery test to pass.
feat: Execute the go mod why command and parse results.
test(detectable): Add a test for the GoModWhyParser.
feat: Remove modules if they are in an exclusion list.
fix(go): Make sure both the from and to dependency should be included.
test(battery): Update the resource files for the go-mod battery test.

timeline.bodyText: I know the team isn't in love with comments but I always find it helpful–when I'm looking at parser code–when there's a brief comment showing an example line of what's being parsed (a la GoModGraphParser.parseGoModGraph).
timeline.author: crowleySynopsys
